title: Move Farmers and Bloon Bots to below abilities instead of above
author: DestructivForce

text: Since bloon bots and farmers look exactly like abilities and are in the exact same ui element as abilities, some players get tripped up hitting the wrong ability hotkey, at least until they get used to farmers and bloon bots being there. This was a major issue when bloon bots and farmers were first introduced, and while most HoM players have gotten used to it, newer players are still likely to get confused. If bloon bots and farmers showed at the end of the ability list rather than the beginning, this would not be an issue.
It would more easily allow new players to figure out that (anti)stalling exists
Allows for easier data collection when it comes to stuff like round timing, impact of (anti)stall.

Increases skill ceiling: you would be able to know when opponent boost comes back allowing you to time rushes, know when sabo is running out, when x5x mortar ability will run out, when highwayman 3 cooldown is over so you can avoid your tower getting sold etc.
Is generally a quality of life improvement

title: Add a random map button to private matches
author: TheOneAndOnlyGhast

text: Add a random map button to private matches. This would be a great option for tournaments or just messing around with your friends, and isn't a massive feature to code. It shouldn't take too much content out of a major update, and would honestly be a great addition.
One more thing: there should be a menu where you can pick which arena you get maps from. So you could pick WW maps only, HoM maps only, etc.

title: Remove Bloon Bot Factory from Hall of Masters
author: CologneIsGood

text: Bot Fac is an extremely easy map to defend on, and it's layout causes max stall. These two factors combined with the fact that you can't get permanent defense lead to a map that has close to no interaction until round 40. These three issues lead to a very unfun map that should not be in HoM

With more heroes and hero alts being added it will take longer and longer to scroll through, not only that it also is somewhat laggy then you first enter in and try to scroll through the heroes

Therefore this change will make it more like the btd6 hero menu (which is vastly superior) while still having the 3d hero preview thing because I assume NK doesn't want to get rid of them cuz they look cool
Revert all the stupid caltrops changes all the way back to one damage and also revert the +1 pierce buff

title: Add additional customizability to what happens when you find a match
author: JazzyJonah

text: Allow options (in settings) for what happens when you find a match:
- Audio cue
- Orange glow
- Taskbar notification
- Automatically switch tab to Battles 2
This would allow people to choose how they want to be notified of finding a match, and would be a good QOL update
